DataElement.preferredName: ICANS Seizure Attribution Seizure Severity Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Immune Effector Cell Associated Neurotoxicity Syndrome (ICANS) description for the participant's seizure (not attributable to any other cause).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Immune Effector Cell Associated Neurotoxicity Syndrome Seizure Attribution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: _Neurotoxicity associated with immune effector cell therapy. It may be characterized by aphasia, altered level of consciousness, motor weakness, seizures, and cerebral edema:Sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin._To assign to a cause or source.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Immune Effector Cell Associated Neurotoxicity Syndrome
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Neurotoxicity associated with immune effector cell therapy. It may be characterized by aphasia, altered level of consciousness, motor weakness, seizures, and cerebral edema.

Concepts.longName: Immune Effector Cell Associated Neurotoxicity Syndrome
Concepts.definition: Neurotoxicity associated with immune effector cell therapy. It may be characterized by aphasia, altered level of consciousness, motor weakness, seizures, and cerebral edema.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: Life-threatening prolonged seizure (> 5 min); or repetitive clinical or electrical seizures without return to baseline in between
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Life-threatening prolonged seizure (> 5 min); or Repetitive clinical or electrical seizures without return to baseline in between

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Life-threatening prolonged seizure (> 5 min); or repetitive clinical or electrical seizures without return to baseline in between
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Life-threatening prolonged seizure (> 5 min); or repetitive clinical or electrical seizures without return to baseline in between.

PermissibleValues.value: Any clinical seizure focal or generalized that resolves rapidly or nonconvulsive seizures on EEG that resolve with intervention
